blogPost.excerpt: Early stage fundraising is hard. Understanding any long-term repercussions make it easier. ⠀ Introducing the Carta SAFE Calculator. ⠀ In just a few clicks you can: -Calculate your future dilution -Compare the impact of pre vs. post money SAFEs
blogPost.body: Early stage fundraising is hard. Understanding any long-term repercussions make it easier. ⠀ Introducing the Carta SAFE Calculator. ⠀ In just a few clicks you can: -Calculate your future dilution -Compare the impact of pre vs. post money SAFEs
blogPost.title: Carta SAFE Calculator - Calculate your future dilution in just a few clicks
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 早期阶段的筹款是很难的。了解任何长期的影响，使其更容易。⠀ 介绍Carta SAFE计算器。⠀ 只需点击几下，您就可以。-计算您的未来稀释 -比较资金前与资金后SAFEs的影响。
localize.tagline: 只需点击几下，就能计算出您未来的稀释率。

localize.description: 早期階段的籌款是很難的。瞭解任何長期的影響，使其更容易。⠀ 介紹Carta SAFE計算器。⠀ 只需點擊幾下，您就可以。-計算您的未來稀釋 -比較資金前與資金後SAFEs的影響。
localize.tagline: 只需點擊幾下，就能計算出您未來的稀釋率。

previous.excerpt: Ponder guides you through daily journaling right from your new tab. With self-reflective prompts, fast keyboard shortcuts, aesthetic backgrounds, and privately-stored entries, you can just focus on writing — Ponder takes care of the rest.
previous.title: Ponder - Daily journal from your new tab

localize.description: Ponder引导你在新的标签页上完成每日日记。有了自我反思的提示、快速键盘快捷键、美学背景和私人存储的条目，你只需专注于写作--Ponder 会处理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 从您的新标签页的每日日记

localize.description: Ponder引導你在新的標籤頁上完成每日日記。有了自我反思的提示、快速鍵盤快捷鍵、美學背景和私人存儲的條目，你只需專注於寫作--Ponder 會處理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 從您的新標籤頁的每日日記

next.excerpt: This newsletter is made with serious love. I've selected and partnered with some of the funniest indie comic artists in the world. This daily newsletter will put a smile on your face.
next.title: The Funnies - The funniest web comics delivered to your inbox

localize.description: 这篇通讯是用严肃的爱做的。我选择了一些世界上最有趣的独立漫画家并与之合作。这份每日通讯会让你脸上露出笑容。
localize.tagline: 将最有趣的网络漫画发送到您的收件箱中

localize.description: 這篇通訊是用嚴肅的愛做的。我選擇了一些世界上最有趣的獨立漫畫家並與之合作。這份每日通訊會讓你臉上露出笑容。
localize.tagline: 將最有趣的網絡漫畫發送到您的收件箱中
